morning.title: Good morning
morning.content_1: ‚ÄúEither you run the day or the day runs you‚Äù
morning.content_2: ‚ÄúHave a happy and lucky new day‚Äù
morning.content_4: ‚ÄúThe leaves are green, my heart is red. Have a nice morning‚Äù
morning.content_5: ‚ÄúAbsolutely focus to have a productive day‚Äù
morning.content_6: ‚ÄúWishing you a new day full of energy for a productive day‚Äù
morning.content_7: ‚ÄúYour spirit is good today. Have a great working day‚Äù
morning.content_8: ‚ÄúLearn as if you will live forever, live like you will die tomorrow‚Äù
morning.content_9: ‚ÄúI have not failed. I've just found 10,000 ways that won't work‚Äù
morning.content_11: ‚ÄúI never look back, darling. It distracts from the now‚Äù
morning.content_14: ‚ÄúWishing you a brilliant and happy morning‚Äù
morning.content_15: ‚ÄúA year from now you will wish you had started today‚Äù
morning.content_16: ‚ÄúHope this message will bring you happiness and luck from my place‚Äù
morning.content_17: ‚ÄúDon't let someone else's opinion of you become your reality‚Äù
morning.content_18: ‚ÄúHustle beats talent when talent doesn‚Äôt hustle‚Äù
morning.content_19: ‚ÄúSet your goals high, and don‚Äôt stop till you get there‚Äù
morning.content_20: ‚ÄúI have stood on a mountain of no‚Äôs for one yes‚Äù
morning.content_21: ‚ÄúInspiration does exist, but it must find you working‚Äù
morning.content_22: ‚ÄúDon‚Äôt let yesterday take up too much of today‚Äù
morning.content_23: ‚ÄúIt is better to fail in originality than to succeed in imitation‚Äù
morning.content_24: ‚ÄúTry to take advantage of every opportunity that comes you way‚Äù
morning.content_25: ‚ÄúDon't wait. The time will never be just right‚Äù
morning.content_27: ‚ÄúChange your thoughts and you change your world‚Äù
morning.content_28: ‚ÄúEvery strike brings me closer to the next home run‚Äù
morning.content_29: ‚ÄúTalent wins games, but teamwork and intelligence win championships‚Äù
morning.content_30: ‚ÄúThe beginning is the most important part of the work‚Äù
morning.content_31: ‚ÄúWhen you like your work every day is a holiday‚Äù
morning.content_32: ‚ÄúDoing what you like is freedom. Liking what you do is happiness‚Äù
morning.content_33: ‚ÄúAs a cure for worrying, work is better than whiskey‚Äù
morning.content_34: ‚ÄúIf you don‚Äôt risk anything, you risk even more‚Äù
morning.content_35: ‚ÄúCan anything be sadder than work left unfinished? Yes, work never begun‚Äù
morning.content_36: ‚ÄúSuccess is getting what you want, happiness is wanting what you get‚Äù
morning.content_37: ‚ÄúNo challenge shall never know all its capabilities‚Äù
morning.content_38: ‚ÄúSuccess is a journey not a destination‚Äù

afternoon.title: Good afternoon
afternoon.content_1: ‚ÄúEither you run the day or the day runs you‚Äù
afternoon.content_2: ‚ÄúThis afternoon, I hope everything will be all right‚Äù
afternoon.content_3: ‚ÄúAbsolutely focus to have a productive day‚Äù
afternoon.content_4: ‚ÄúHope this message will bring you happiness and luck from my place‚Äù
afternoon.content_5: ‚ÄúSetting goals is the first step in turning the invisible into the visible‚Äù
afternoon.content_7: ‚ÄúYour spirit is good today. Have a great working day‚Äù
afternoon.content_8: ‚ÄúIt is never too late to be what you might have been‚Äù
afternoon.content_9: ‚ÄúTry to take advantage of every opportunity that comes you way‚Äù
afternoon.content_10: ‚ÄúIf you‚Äôre not positive energy, you‚Äôre negative energy.‚Äù
afternoon.content_12: ‚ÄúChange your thoughts and you change your world‚Äù
afternoon.content_13: ‚ÄúAlone we can do so little, together we can do so much‚Äù
afternoon.content_14: ‚ÄúTalent wins games, but teamwork and intelligence win championships‚Äù
afternoon.content_15: ‚ÄúThe beginning is the most important part of the work‚Äù
afternoon.content_16: ‚ÄúWhen you like your work every day is a holiday‚Äù
afternoon.content_17: ‚ÄúDoing what you like is freedom. Liking what you do is happiness‚Äù
afternoon.content_18: ‚ÄúAs a cure for worrying, work is better than whiskey‚Äù
afternoon.content_19: ‚ÄúYou don‚Äôt have to see the whole staircase, just take the first step‚Äù
afternoon.content_20: ‚ÄúCan anything be sadder than work left unfinished? Yes, work never begun‚Äù
afternoon.content_21: ‚ÄúWork until your bank account looks like a phone number‚Äù
afternoon.content_22: ‚ÄúNo challenge shall never know all its capabilities‚Äù
afternoon.content_23: ‚ÄúSuccess is a journey not a destination‚Äù

evening.title: Good evening
evening.content_1: ‚ÄúEither you run the day or the day runs you‚Äù
evening.content_2: ‚ÄúIt is never too late to be what you might have been‚Äù
evening.content_3: ‚ÄúTry to take advantage of every opportunity that comes you way‚Äù
evening.content_4: ‚ÄúPeople rarely succeed unless they have fun in what they are doing‚Äù
evening.content_6: ‚ÄúChange your thoughts and you change your world‚Äù
evening.content_7: ‚ÄúThey always say time changes things, but you actually have to change them yourself‚Äù
evening.content_8: ‚ÄúTalent wins games, but teamwork and intelligence win championships‚Äù
evening.content_9: ‚ÄúThe beginning is the most important part of the work‚Äù
evening.content_10: ‚ÄúWhen you like your work every day is a holiday‚Äù
evening.content_11: ‚ÄúDoing what you like is freedom. Liking what you do is happiness‚Äù
evening.content_12: ‚ÄúAs a cure for worrying, work is better than whiskey‚Äù
evening.content_13: ‚ÄúI can accept failure, everyone fails at something. But I can‚Äôt accept not trying‚Äù
evening.content_14: ‚ÄúCan anything be sadder than work left unfinished? Yes, work never begun‚Äù
evening.content_15: ‚ÄúWork until your bank account looks like a phone number‚Äù
evening.content_16: ‚ÄúNo challenge shall never know all its capabilities‚Äù
evening.content_17: ‚ÄúSuccess is a journey not a destination‚Äù

birthday.title: Happy Birthday
birthday.content_1: ‚ÄúHope all your birthday wishes come true!‚Äù
birthday.content_2: ‚ÄúIt‚Äôs your special day ‚Äî get out there and celebrate!‚Äù
birthday.content_3: ‚ÄúThe day is all yours ‚Äî have fun!‚Äù
birthday.content_4: ‚ÄúWishing you the biggest slice of happy today.‚Äù
birthday.content_5: ‚ÄúI hope your celebration gives you many happy memories!‚Äù
birthday.content_7: ‚ÄúYou‚Äôre older today than yesterday but younger than tomorrow, HPBD!‚Äù
birthday.content_9: ‚Äúoday is about you. I can‚Äôt wait to celebrate you all day long!‚Äù
birthday.content_10: ‚ÄúWherever the year ahead takes you, I hope it‚Äôs happy.‚Äù
birthday.content_11: ‚ÄúThinking of you on your birthday and wishing you everything happy‚Äù
birthday.content_12: ‚ÄúBest wishes on your birthday ‚Äì may you have many, many more‚Äù
birthday.content_13: ‚ÄúCheers to you for another trip around the sun!‚Äù
birthday.content_14: ‚ÄúCongratulations on another year of skillful death evasion!‚Äù

thunderstorm.content_1: ‚ÄúIt's thundering today, you'd better not go out‚Äù
thunderstorm.content_2: ‚ÄúThe weather is bad, let's stay in the room‚Äù

rain.content_2: ‚ÄúIt's raining, don't forget to bring an umbrella‚Äù

snow.title: Snow
snow.content_1: ‚ÄúIt's snowing, don't forget to wear warm clothes‚Äù

clear.title: Clear
clear.content_1: ‚ÄúIt's sunny and not cloudy, wear sunscreen when going out‚Äù

clouds.title: Clouds
clouds.content_1: ‚ÄúToday is a beautiful day, let's go out and enjoy‚Äù
clouds.content_2: ‚ÄúWhen you like your work every day is a holiday‚Äù
clouds.content_3: ‚ÄúSuccess is a journey not a destination‚Äù
clouds.content_4: ‚ÄúWherever the year ahead takes you, I hope it‚Äôs happy.‚Äù
clouds.content_5: ‚ÄúDoing what you like is freedom. Liking what you do is happiness‚Äù
